about_the_game:
Real Cricket Mod Creator is an app created by Nautilus Mobile - the creators of the hit mobile-cricket franchise Real Cricket. This app lets you create and customise in-game assets of Real Cricket and publish it straight to the Real Cricket servers. These assets will then be available for download on your favourite game on mobile – Real Cricket

Tournaments: Edit and customise more than 50 Tournaments of Real Cricket such that the user can change the name of the tournament and its logo by simply uploading an image.

Teams: With more than 450 cricket teams on offer, users can customise his favourite team starting with renaming the team to uploading a new logo and some advanced customisation features to edit and customise the team jerseys to your liking.

Player: Customise your favourite cricketers in the game by simply filtering out the tournaments and teams which they represent and unlocking a host of customisation options starting with changing their name, jersey number, jersey name and advanced customisation options for editing their faces, hand color, shape, hair and size of their head and body.

This app lets you create your own tournaments, teams and players and download it directly to your favourite mobile game – Real Cricket making it one of the few games on mobile which lets you customise everything to your liking and never know boredom ever again!

name: Real Cricket Mod Creator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 630
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Customize tournaments, jerseys, player faces etc. and publish the assets to our servers to get it on our mobile game - Real Cricket
